info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 6:01PM CDT until August 18 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago IL
info.description:
FFWLOT
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... Southeastern Lee County in north central Illinois...
* Until 900 PM CDT.
* At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area with rates up to 2-3 inches per hour. Thunderstorms are continuing to develop across the same areas, with up to 3.5 inches of rain so far near West Brooklyn, Compton, and Paw Paw. Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flood severity is expected to worsen shortly.
HAZARD...Significant flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.
IMPACT...Rapid-onset, significant flooding of creeks, streams, drainage ditches, low-lying areas, and poor drainage areas. Widespread street and underpass flooding. Possible flooding of structures. Possible flooding of highways.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Shabbona, Waterman, Paw Paw, Sublette, Woodhaven Lakes, Lee, Compton and West Brooklyn.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 9:00 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 9:00 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:00 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:00 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
